text: 2.9 Jon 3.16, Lom 5.18, Plp 2.7-9, 1 Ti 2.6, 1 Jo 2.2, Lep 5.9 Chɨn pen Jisas bɨnonɨm yɨb awl dup ak nopun. God ne binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨnɨm agɨl agek, Jisas kɨlop nen kumak. Anɨb ak yokɨp sɨkol won ak ensel okok bɨawl tek yelak, Jisas ne tam okok tek yek. Pen yul awl dɨl kumek, God gek mɨñɨl yɨb awl dɨl bɨnonɨm yɨbɨl mɨdeb.
